-   `unselect` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 反选
-   `delete` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 删除
-   `clear` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 清除所有图形

## fromActions

[src/components/D3Graph.js:165-182](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/f8c94bc381c53e687819d4f76e101852fe286320/src/components/D3Graph.js#L165-L182 "Source code on GitHub")

反序列化actions

**Parameters**

-   `actions` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)&lt;[ActionOptionType](#actionoptiontype)>** 

**Examples**

```javascript
const actions=fromActions([{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"LineDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"line1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
},{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"DotDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"dot1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
}])
```

## DrawAction

[src/components/D3Graph.js:258-262](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/f8c94bc381c53e687819d4f76e101852fe286320/src/components/D3Graph.js#L258-L262 "Source code on GitHub")

**Extends Action**

绘图action

**Parameters**

-   `drawingOps`  
-   `ops`  

**Examples**

```javascript
<D3Graph actions={[
	new DrawAction(new LineDrawing({id:"line1",attrs:{x1:0,y1:0,x2:100,y2:100}})),
	new DrawAction(new DotAction({id:"dot1",attrs:{cx:100,cy:100}}))
]}/>
```

### getDrawingActions

[src/components/D3Graph.js:2163-2172](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/f8c94bc381c53e687819d4f76e101852fe286320/src/components/D3Graph.js#L2163-L2172 "Source code on GitHub")

### clear

[src/components/D3Graph.js:2177-2182](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/f8c94bc381c53e687819d4f76e101852fe286320/src/components/D3Graph.js#L2177-L2182 "Source code on GitHub")

清除画布,这个方法除了会把画布上的内容清除以外还会重置内部的action状态

### propTypes

[src/components/D3Graph.js:1822-1859](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/f8c94bc381c53e687819d4f76e101852fe286320/src/components/D3Graph.js#L1822-L1859 "Source code on GitHub")

**Properties**

-   `attrs` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** svg的属性
-   `actions` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** 所有的操作
-   `selectMode` **(single | multiple)** [single] - 选择模式,是多选还是单选
-   `original` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 坐标原点(屏幕坐标),默认值{x:0,y:0}
-   `coordinateType` **([screen](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Guide/Mobile) \| [math](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math))** [screen] - 坐标系,默认值是屏幕坐标系
-   `mode` **(none | playing)** 模式,默认是:none,如果是playing,则是样式模式,会一步一步的演示绘图过程
-   `renderToolbar` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)** 绘图的工具栏
-   `scale` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)?** [1] - 缩放比例,默认是1(1个单位对应一个像素)
-   `interval` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)?** [1] - action的执行时间间隔
-   `onAction` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)?** [null] - action的回调函数,函数包含一个参数 action
